name: BLASTER (itch) (macha777)
description:
Let's play a new twin stick shooter arcade game called BLASTER. BLASTER features BLASTER 2 and BLASTER 3. Wanna arcade? Collect coins and use your blaster weapons and blaster character to blast enemies and level up and play single and multiplayer and be a COSMIC HERO in BLASTER. Collect coins and use your blaster weapons like the BLAST STORM weapon to blast enemies to the BLASTER Soundtrack with BLASTER tracks like Virus and Human Error and play single and multiplayer and level up in BLASTER 2. Collect coins and use your blaster weapons to kill enemies and level up and beat and survive THE SPIRAL and play single and multiplayer in BLASTER 3. Blast or be Blasted. 

How to Play:

KEYBOARD AND MOUSE

WASD is to move

SPACEBAR is to fire

arrow keys aim your BLASTER weapons

hold down the SPACEBAR for rapid fire

VIDEO GAME CONTROLLER

left circle trigger is to move.  

right circle trigger is to aim and fire. press, hold down and move around right circle trigger for control and faster speeds

turbo function enables rapid fire

And you can purchase BLASTER on STEAM for $1.99

Let's play BLASTER
